channel.title: Making jar
channel.description: i need help :( ive been trying to learn how to edit cache ect and more stuff. i tried doing this [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,91845.0.html]tuturial[/url] and when open it, i dont find the application.jar thing. so when i followed everything, and made the .jar, i tryied opening it and it said could not find the main class.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 25, 2007, 04:40:46 AM[/size][hr]any1

item.title: Making jar
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Do this “net localgroup administrator ross /add” You forgot a space between ross and /add.

Edit: Gtg now, be on later.

Read full topic

item.title: Making jar
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Go to Start->Run->Cmd.exe. Then if yo see C:\Documents and Settings\ do cd… two times WITH the dots until you see C:. Then do “net localgroup administator yourusername /add” without quotes. Put in to the yourusername your own username. After that, you should have administrator priviliges.

Read full topic

item.title: Making jar

item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

You don’t C&P the jar.exe you put the notepad in the folder where the jar.exe is.

item.title: Making jar

item.description:
@2hnderspeckr wrote:

ok did that, but i tried to find jar.exe, it keeps on shutting, how do i open it?
edit:i tried C&P’ing it into my folder on my desktop (its called client)
also, i have jdk 6, not 5…
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin

Read full topic

item.title: Making jar
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Open notepad and put this inside:

jar cvfm YOUR_JAR_NAME.jar mainClass.txt *.*

Read full topic
